items.title: Natco CEO says scouting for buyouts larger than Adcock to boost non-US revenue
items.description: Vice Chairman and CEO Rajeev Nannapaneni said the company is looking for another transaction, potentially as large or even larger than the Adcock deal to gain a wider geographical footprint and bring greater stability to core earnings.
